alert.note: Alert for Bath; Elliott; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:42PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ROWAN...MONTGOMERY...ELLIOTT... MENIFEE...BATH...FLEMING...AND POWELL COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 141 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Load to near Winchester and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Mount Sterling, Morehead, Owingsville, Marshall, Jeffersonville, Camargo, Sharpsburg, Salt Lick, Clay Lick, Ramey, Levee, Wyoming, Elliottville, Peasticks, Olympia Springs, Yale, Triplett, Flat Creek, Christy and Odessa. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 12 and 16. Interstate 64 in eastern Kentucky between mile markers 105 and 149. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
